label: 延殷
説明文: At the age of 16 En'in entered Enryakuji and became a disciple of Jinin. In the year 1000 he traveled to China on the orders of the court. Later he received the ryōbu kanjō from Keiun. During the years of confrontation between Enryakuji and Miidera, he escaped to Daigoji where he received the ryōbu kanjō from Ningai.
